description: Check if answer is grounded for a question-answering task based on the provided sources

input_variables.name: answer
input_variables.description: Answer assistant provided to the user(i.e., To execute task A you need to access system B.)

input_variables.name: sources
input_variables.description: Sources retrieved to answer the user question (i.e., file1.pdf: To execute task A you need to access system B. file2.pdf: System B is used when users need to execute task A.)
